title: Betesports
author: Betesports
content: HelloYou may think that they are a great site to play at but they just took me 25 mbtc telling me that my account was linked to another account. I told them that I had an account on nitrogen sports, and there was no indication that was not allowed to play also on nitrobetting. I asked for proof of me having other accounts and they told me that there were "similitudes" with an older account without explaining what they mean by that. They told me explicitly that they will not share with me what proof they have. They just took 25 mbtc. I had 26 mbtc just as deposits and previously cashed out once 10 mbtc. So in total I'm losing 16 mbtc just in deposits. Really can't explain. Their language was also really arrogant.https://gyazo.com/f3b7048291bbbb48f698ca4800a3e4ec

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: This is the link to their announcement thread: Nitrobetting.eu - Unmatched BTC Betting and EntertainmentAnd this is the profile of they official representative: nitrobettingSend him a PM to inform him about your case maybe he can help!Regarding your issue, I don't think it's fair to ban a player's account for multi-accounting without providing any evidence. I understand that they can't share some information publicly but if the player ask for it then I don't understand why they would refuse.

comments.author: Betesports
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on October 16, 2022, 09:22:17 PMThis is the link to their announcement thread: Nitrobetting.eu - Unmatched BTC Betting and EntertainmentAnd this is the profile of they official representative: nitrobettingSend him a PM to inform him about your case maybe he can help!Regarding your issue, I don't think it's fair to ban a player's account for multi-accounting without providing any evidence. They are not just banning me. They are stealing my money too. I'm happy to deposit elsewhere, the problem is they just took all the money on my account . About the evidence. We were talking by emails so no public involved...

comments.author: Extrarakeback
comments.body: Who said its a great site to play ?Â Its a scam site same as nitrogensports

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Nitrobetting is connected to Nitrogensports and as far as I know, Nitrogensports has not had a clean history here. Perhaps it's best to avoid both casinos at this point in time to avoid further future losses.You should also include links showing your account was blocked or the message from them saying you were multiaccounting in the OP. Do you happen to have used a VPN when accessing the account before?

comments.author: Extrarakeback
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on October 16, 2022, 09:22:17 PMThis is the link to their announcement thread: Nitrobetting.eu - Unmatched BTC Betting and EntertainmentAnd this is the profile of they official representative: nitrobettingSend him a PM to inform him about your case maybe he can help!Regarding your issue, I don't think it's fair to ban a player's account for multi-accounting without providing any evidence. I understand that they can't share some information publicly but if the player ask for it then I don't understand why they would refuse. While ago when they used the name nitrogensports they scammed many players saying they have another account. When the truspilot and other reviews sites got so much negative reviews and scam accusations they changed Â the name to nitrobetting to get more new naive Â players. . In a year they will get a new name and they will go on .i dont really think if op messaged them here it will help .

comments.author: Betesports
comments.created_time: October 16, 2022, 09:44:13 PMLast edit: October 18, 2022, 09:40:37 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on October 16, 2022, 09:28:52 PMNitrobetting is connected to Nitrogensports and as far as I know, Nitrogensports has not had a clean history here. Perhaps it's best to avoid both casinos at this point in time to avoid further future losses.You should also include links showing your account was blocked or the message from them saying you were multiaccounting in the OP. Do you happen to have used a VPN when accessing the account before?Yes i used vpn because my internet provider is blocking many of betting sites. And also included an email frkm themGuys please check last email nitrobetting sent me. Now they are accusing me of choosing bets from internet sources and forums. So this is why they are connecting me with other accounts. They have confiscated me 500 usd for this ðŸ™„. My bets have been mostly live and if the bets are suggested you don't wait to place live bets. Wow, just wow. Definitely scamhttps://gyazo.com/c7ceb87e0bda94460bf2ba90f16d31ea

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Sorry about your experience. The usage of VPN is discouraged as some abusers use the same VPNs too. So in case those IP addresses are Identified, it means that they will think your account is also part of the abusing accounts, and now it's hard to prove if you used the VPN for genuine reasons or not.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on October 16, 2022, 09:22:17 PMRegarding your issue, I don't think it's fair to ban a player's account for multi-accounting without providing any evidence. I understand that they can't share some information publicly but if the player ask for it then I don't understand why they would refuse. It's a same broken tap recorder. Bookies will not share their information to prove an account is multi accounting with the excuse of opening a hole for the cheaters. Cheaters will always take advantages of the promotions. The fight is in between bookies and the gamblers. As forum members we are not getting paid nor can talk with confidence who is guilty because you do not have any data.Lately I am tired of seeing the accusations against bookies and them not defending cases with evidence.Betesports, is this money includes your deposit?

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Playing on this website was never safe, there were already bad reviews against them. You may not have noticed. Such reputable websites convince their customers to make a deposit, and when the customer does deposit, withholds their funds using various excuses.Source : https://www.trustpilot.com/review/nitrobetting.eu

comments.author: actmyname
comments.body: Casinos will cast a wide net to prevent promotion abuse. The problem with vulnerabilities is that even if you offer a small gap, it can be blasted wide open, so there's really no incentive to provide much tolerance.You say your internet provider bans certain sites, but is that because the region you reside bans gambling or the use of these sites in general?

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: actmyname on October 21, 2022, 06:04:54 PMYou say your internet provider bans certain sites, but is that because the region you reside bans gambling or the use of these sites in general? Some casinos mention in their Terms & Service agreements that players are not allowed to access and wager from locations where internet gambling is illegal. I am not sure if that is also the case with Nitrobetting. It doesn't really matter at this point because OP was assumedly banned for having multiple accounts, something he isn't denying. More precisely, he has one on the other Nitro(something) casino.Â  Â And there is now also the claim that he gambled on matches from some internet forums. I assume they mean tipsters and so-called "fixed" matches.

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on October 23, 2022, 01:46:20 PMQuote from: actmyname on October 21, 2022, 06:04:54 PMYou say your internet provider bans certain sites, but is that because the region you reside bans gambling or the use of these sites in general? Some casinos mention in their Terms & Service agreements that players are not allowed to access and wager from locations where internet gambling is illegal. I am not sure if that is also the case with Nitrobetting. It doesn't really matter at this point because OP was assumedly banned for having multiple accounts, something he isn't denying. More precisely, he has one on the other Nitro(something) casino.Â  Â And there is now also the claim that he gambled on matches from some internet forums. I assume they mean tipsters and so-called "fixed" matches. Â  You should read correctly, he said he had an account with nitrogen sports in the past, and now this problem is with nitrobetting, the sister company. They migrated all old accounts from nitrosports to nitrobetting without even informing their customers, I also suddenly got nitrobetting emails even though I quit nitro 2,5 years ago, at that point nitrobetting didnt even exist. Then they told me about the migration and also that my account now is blocked because of "similarities to an other account", even though I never even created this account in the first place, so never logged in or whatever.Nitrogen is just a scam site and should not be trusted. They pull this multiple account bullshit all the time.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on October 23, 2022, 08:34:23 PMYou should read correctly, he said he had an account with nitrogen sports in the past, and now this problem is with nitrobetting, the sister company. I read it correctly, and I am aware of what was said. Did you read my post correctly? I am not justifying the casino's actions, just stating the facts. OP has several accounts on Nitro....... attach nouns such as "betting" or "sports" instead of the dots. And I was replying to actmyname and his comment. Based on what he said, I thought he was using a different angle to this issue. It felt like he was trying to question whether OP was banned because he resides in a country where online gambling and/or crypto is illegal. I don't think that's the problem because the casino was talking about multiple accounts.Â  Â Quote from: Maasdamer on October 23, 2022, 08:34:23 PMNitrogen is just a scam site and should not be trusted. Correct.

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on October 24, 2022, 10:35:07 AMQuote from: Maasdamer on October 23, 2022, 08:34:23 PMYou should read correctly, he said he had an account with nitrogen sports in the past, and now this problem is with nitrobetting, the sister company. OP has several accounts on Nitro....... attach nouns such as "betting" or "sports" instead of the dots. And I was replying to actmyname and his comment. Based on what he said, I thought he was using a different angle to this issue. It felt like he was trying to question whether OP was banned because he resides in a country where online gambling and/or crypto is illegal. I don't think that's the problem because the casino was talking about multiple accounts.Â  Â Quote from: Maasdamer on October 23, 2022, 08:34:23 PMNitrogen is just a scam site and should not be trusted. Correct.Sorry but you are once again a little wrong. Nitrogensports some years ago created nitrobetting and actively encouraged players to also play on betting.They sent emails to nitrosports players sounding like " did you know nitrogensports has a new site you can try with more bonuses, more blabla, and so on" .I even asked if its allowed to have accounts on both sites (because back then I was still ok with nitro and considered trying the new site) and they said it totally allowed.So OP did nothing wrong have an account at both sites, trust me.Well at least we both know nitro is a worthless scam, whatever which endingÂ   .

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on October 24, 2022, 06:39:28 PM<Snip> It gets tiring having to justify yourself over and over again. I am aware of the connection between the two sites. I didn't say the player did anything wrong. I am saying that's the reason and explanation the casino used for closing his account. Since the casino's reputation is well known here, you know what to expect from them.
